pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 31, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a conversation with Chief Executive Officer of Hootsuite Ryan Holmes by video conference, as part of the 2019 Hootsuite Corporate Kick Off meeting.

Closed to media.

Milton, Ontario

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Gymnasium
Craig Kielburger Secondary School
1151 Ferguson Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
    • Media requiring advance set-up will have site access as of 5:00 p.m. All media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
